SEARCH
Package main.model

Class Coffee

java.lang.Object
main.model.MenuItem
main.model.Coffee
public class Coffee extends MenuItem
Represents a brewed coffee order with a specific cup size, quantity, and optional add-ins such as milk or syrup.

  • Constructor Details

    • Coffee

      public Coffee(CupSize size, int quantity)
      Creates a coffee object with the given size and quantity.
      Parameters:
      size - the cup size (SHORT, TALL, GRANDE, VENTI)
      quantity - number of cups ordered
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if size is null

    • addAddIn

      Adds an add-in to this coffee.
      Parameters:
      a - the add-in to add
      Returns:
      true if added; false if already present

    • removeAddIn

      public boolean removeAddIn(AddIns a)

      Parameters:
      a - the add-in to remove
      Returns:
      true if removed

    • price

      public double price()
      Computes the total price of this coffee order. Base price: Short = 2.39; each size step +0.60. Each add-in is +0.25.
      Specified by:
      price in class MenuItem
      Returns:
      total price
